display_long_description:
The future of video isn’t flat. It’s immersive.

Welcome to Rival, the first VR Social Video app where immersive experiences come to life. Whether you're a fan of gameplay highlights, animations, or cinematic short films, Rival transforms every video into an unforgettable immersive VR experience.

For Viewers
- Experience stunning VR videos in 180°/360°, Spatial Storytelling, and stereoscopic 3D Gameplay.
- Engage, interact, and support your favorite creators (even 2D ones!).
Seamlessly blending virtual content with your real environment with Passthrough options

For Creators
- Showcase your work to millions of VR users.
- Earn money through fan donations (coming soon), exclusive engagement rewards, and brand partnerships.
- Easily convert and transition your 2D content into immersive VR experiences.

Download Rival today and step into the beginning of Social Video!
User Notice: This app streams content and requires a high-speed internet connection for the best experience.
